Package Model

Class UserHandler

java.lang.Object
Model.FileHandler
Model.UserHandler
public class UserHandler
extends FileHandler
This class is used to handle interactions with user files

    • setupSaveUserDirectory

      public void setupSaveUserDirectory​(java.lang.String saveUserDirectory) throws SetupDirectoryException
      Setups the directory for users' saves.
      Parameters:
      saveUserDirectory - Path to the directory users' saves
      Throws:
      SetupDirectoryException - if setup failed

    • checkAndCreateSaveDirectory

      private void checkAndCreateSaveDirectory​(java.io.File file) throws DirectoryCreationException
      Checks if the directory exists. Otherwise, creates it.
      Parameters:
      file - File created with path to the save_user directory
      Throws:
      DirectoryCreationException - if directory creation failed

    • getSaveTextFromUser

      private java.lang.String getSaveTextFromUser​(User user)
      Get the save text from the user
      Parameters:
      user - User to be handle
      Returns:
      The user save in a string

    • createUserSave

      public void createUserSave​(User user) throws SaveUserCreationException, UserAlreadyExistsException
      Creates a save corresponding to given user.
      Parameters:
      user - User to be saved in a text file
      Throws:
      SaveUserCreationException - when the creation of the user save fails
      UserAlreadyExistsException - if there already is a user with that username

    • writeSave

      private void writeSave​(User user, java.io.File file) throws SaveWritingException
      Writes a user's data in his save file.
      Parameters:
      user - User to be saved.
      file - File in which to write.
      Throws:
      SaveWritingException - when the save could not be written

    • saveUser

      public void saveUser​(User user) throws SaveUserException
      Save the user in the user directory
      Parameters:
      user - user contain all the new data to be saved
      Throws:
      SaveUserException - when the user save could not be written

    • getUserFromSave

      public User getUserFromSave​(java.lang.String username) throws UserFromSaveCreationException
      Creates a user from its username and its save in the save_user directory.
      Parameters:
      username - Username (identifying users)
      Returns:
      User created
      Throws:
      UserFromSaveCreationException - when then user can not be created from the save corresponding to the username given

    • saveUserExists

      public boolean saveUserExists​(java.lang.String username)
      Check if the save user file exists
      Parameters:
      username - username of the user
      Returns:
      TRUE if file exists, FALSE otherwise

    • getInformation

      private java.lang.String getInformation​(java.io.File file, java.lang.String flag) throws java.io.IOException
      Searches the information needed with the given save file flag.
      Parameters:
      file - File corresponding to user save file
      flag - Flag to extract the information from
      Returns:
      Information needed, or empty string if empty file/flag
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if any IO error interaction occurs

      Parameters:

      user - User whose last name is set
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - if any IO error interaction occurs
